entry.source: I'm looking for corpses of {F804,5}Pluto{F801}Soldiers.{F804,0} They're made of something like oil,{F801}so we can use them for fuel. If we get enough,{F801}we can keep people from freezing to death{F801}during the winter. If you find any{F801}{F872,1}s, please bring them to me.{F801}
entry.target: I'm looking for corpses of {F804,5}Pluto{F801}Soldiers.{F804,0} They're made of something like oil,{F801}so we can use them for fuel. If we get enough,{F801}we can keep people from freezing to death{F801}during the winter. If you find any{F801}{F872,1}s, please bring them to me.{F801}
